There are two main routes to get to Caminha. Using the N13 national road, which links it to
going north; or the A28 speed-way. A28 has virtual tolls, foreign cars must apply for a temporary permit.
Caminha its famous for its copper handiwork.

To have a fun night just go through the Torre do Relógio tower to the Rua Direita. There is a great number of Bars and Cafés you can enjoy a drink. The peculiarity on this street is the possibility of mingle with people from other bars on the street. As there is no minimum consumption in most of the them and they are quite close from each other.

There is free wi-fi on the main plaza, Praça Conselheiro Silva Torres (a.k.a. "O Terreiro") but oftenly doesn't work.
